About

I amd graduate from IIT Madras. I am passionate about startups and bunisess and I believe learning never stops. So I'm trying my hand at coding, ML and AI

This Blog is to cornicle my journey thorugh this learning process. The idea is to document so others can also learn or more basically figure out how to go about learning. Hope this helps you in some way!
